name: The States Of Matters
description:
A short puzzle-platformer where you go through a gauntlet of lab tests as S.A.M. (Sentient Anomalous Material), a living, state-shifting material. 

Arrow Keys/WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

F - Interact

E - Solid-to-Liquid-to-Gas

Q - Gas-to-Liquid-to-Solid
